name: Egg Hunt (itch) (Samuel Wilson)
description:
Created in just under 20 hours for the 3 days Eggstravaganza Game Jam 2021

Controls:
W,A,S,D - Move
LMB - Pick up
RMB - When holding throw
Tab - Check egg count
E - Light
LShift - Sprint
Esc - Pause

This does have bugs including:

The AI in multiple ways.
The stamina and light regen stuff.

If you play and find bugs please comment them below it would be appreciated!

Assets used:

3DToys AssetPack - Unity Asset store
MadGoat ModularHouse - Unity Asset store
NatureManufacture - Unity Asset store
Realtime Rascals- Unity Asset store
SkySeries - Unity Asset store
TheGamingPeople Swing - Unity Asset store
V1 Fences- Unity Asset store
